column5: Yes. I became obsessed with having as little calories as possible in my body to lose weight. Then I just stopped eating in general. Then threw up if I binged out of loss of control. Itâ€™s a vicious horrible cycle.

Al-anon is a support group for the families of alcoholics. However, a lot of meetings are accepting to discuss all kinds of issues. Eating disorders are a form of addiction so maybe you could find resources there. Best of luck and lots of love.
